content:
```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

# ERROR TIPS
### Cannot connect belts directly to a chest
-  Use an inserter to input items into chests. Belts cannot be directly connected to chests.
### Errors when placing an inserter
-  Make sure that there is no entity already present at the position where the inserter is to be placed.
-  Check the direction and spacing of the inserter to ensure it does not overlap with existing entities.

# NAMESPACE
```
